06352019a19ae31e527f37f7571c6dd7f0c5da37: A bridge suddenly collapsed, causing vehicles to fall into a river, resulting in a chaotic scene with injured people, including schoolchildren, in need of rescue, and some vehicles landing upside down with passengers fearing for their lives.
24521a2abb2e1f5e34e6824e0f9e56904a2b0e88: President Bush underwent a colonoscopy, during which 5 small polyps were removed, none of which appear to be cancerous. He is in good spirits and will resume his activities at Camp David, having had similar procedures to remove polyps in the past.
ee8871b15c50d0db17b0179a6d2beab35065f1e9: A Miami jail is housing many mentally ill inmates who are being held pretrial on charges that could have been avoided, exacerbating their conditions during arrest. A judge is advocating for the rights of these individuals, and a new mental health facility is set to open in 2008, focusing on treatment rather than punishment.
42c027e4ff9730fbb3de84c1af0d2c506e41c3e4: Daniel Radcliffe has turned 18, granting him access to his £20 million fortune, which was held in a trust fund until now. Despite his newfound wealth, Radcliffe plans to avoid extravagance and has expressed a desire to shed the "kid star" image, opting for a low-key celebration. With the Harry Potter film series complete, he is now exploring other movie projects.
